items.title: Frank's Box
description: Your uncle did not leave a will, and you are investigating his house. In your curiosity, you turn on the spirit box in the centre of his study, and the lights go out. Three candles on the table light up, wax never melting. There’s a salt circle around the table.
Can you communicate with your uncle through the box? Only one way to find out… Maybe you’ll figure out the whole deal with the inheritance, too, while you’re at it.

Made for JamSepticEye, Frank's Box, you must use the spirit box to communicate with your deceased uncle, Frank, about his will. There may be some other presences you have to deal with as well. Items around the room can help you solve puzzles. Make sure to listen to the spirit box; it can be very helpful.

items.title: Morithon
description: Based on a popular minigame from Garry’s Mod, Morithon is a game that puts up to 4 players in a race against each other on an obstacle course.
Another player, the host of the game show, can activate various traps to stop the others in their tracks by using a drone.
This was a school project completed by a group of 45 students in a single semester.

items.title: Purranormal Activity
description: A 2D side scrolling game where you take the form of a ghost cat trying to cause as much chaos as you can.
Made for the 2024 Black Cat Jam

items.title: ELUDE
description: A 2D sidescrolling horror game. Where you traverse through a house collecting mementos and avoiding a wandering hideous creature
This game was made in Unity for the 2023 TOJam

items.title: Paper Paladin
description: A top down action game where the player fights hordes of paper cutout enemies with a giant plastic knife
This game was made in the first two weeks of my Game Physics class where I was the lead programmer

items.title: Wolf's Lost Legacy
description: A 2D sidescroller game. You play as a wolf that must traverse through levels, gain powerups and new abilities, all to reunite with your family
TA digital prototype of a game that we created in Unity in our Game Concepts class. I worked as a lead programmer

items.title: Bunch O Boxes
description: Solve puzzles by detaching and reattaching yourself to other boxes to reach the end,

items.title: Daemon Crawlers
description: A top down action game where the player must clear hordes of demons to progress to the next room in this endless dungeon.
This was my midstone project in 3rd semester. It is made entirely in C++ using SDL2
